## PerkStyle class

A representation of a perk style - a tree and 4 (if primary) or 2 (if secondary) runes that were selected.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class PerkStyle 
```

|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [selected](./shieldbow.perkstyle.selected.md) |  | [Rune](./shieldbow.rune.md)<!-- -->\[\] | The selected runes. |
|  [tree](./shieldbow.perkstyle.tree.md) |  | [RuneTree](./shieldbow.runetree.md) | The rune tree that this perk style is based on. |
